empty.title: No favorites yet
empty.description: Save your favorite questions by tapping the heart icon while playing.

deleteModal.title: Delete favorites
deleteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete all favorites from this category? This action cannot be undone.

deleteItemModal.title: Delete item
deleteItemModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action can't be undone

support.title: Support
support.rate: Rate us on the App Store

settingsLanguage.title: App language
settingsLanguage.description: Change the app language and all content.

settingsFeedback.title: How can we improve?
settingsFeedback.description: Let us know how we can improve the product or what you'd
settingsFeedback.descriptionBold: like to see in the future.

shuffle.title: Shuffle
shuffle.description: Can't decide which category to explore? Let the shuffle feature surprise you! Press generate to get a random conversation question from any category - perfect for keeping things spontaneous and exciting.
shuffle.formatDescription: Random questions from all categories. Use filters to customize your experience by selecting specific categories and subcategories you want to include.

shuffleSession.title: Shuffle
shuffleSession.selectAtLeastOne: Select at least one category to continue

restartModal.title: Restart shuffle
restartModal.description: You've seen all questions in the selected categories. Want to restart and go through them again?

resetConfirm.title: Reset filters
resetConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to reset all filters? This will deselect all categories.

rotateDevice.title: Please rotate your device
rotateDevice.description: This app is designed for portrait mode only. Please rotate your device to continue.

desktopWarning.title: Mobile device required
desktopWarning.description: Lummy is designed for mobile devices. Please open this app on your smartphone for the best experience.

exitModal.title: Exit
exitModal.description: Are you sure you want to exit this session?

slide1.title: Better convos
slide1.description: Say goodbye to awkward silence. Lummy helps you ask better questions that lead to something meaningful.

slide2.title: Get closer, faster
slide2.description: Learn more about the people you love or want to know better with questions that spark honesty, laughter, and deeper connection.

slide3.title: Always something new
slide3.description: Endless questions across a variety of curated topics to keep every conversation engaging and unexpected.

paywall.description: Endless generations of questions, all categories unlocked, no limits.

monthly.title: Monthly
monthly.renewalText: Your plan renews monthly unless you cancel.

shuffle.about: A completely random mix of questions from all categories and vibes. You never know what's coming next â€” could be funny, deep, spicy, or reflective. Perfect for groups who want variety and spontaneity.
shuffle.format: Works for 2â€“15 people. Random selection from all question types. Keep everyone guessing, keep the energy high.

This or That.about: Quick, playful either-or questions that reveal preferences and personality in seconds. Perfect for icebreakers and discovering what makes someone tick through simple but telling choices.
This or That.format: Great for 2â€“8 people. Simple, casual, low-pressure questions. No stress, just fun conversation.

Light Questions.about: Warm, approachable questions that keep things friendly and comfortable. Great for getting to know someone without diving too deep too fast.
Light Questions.format: Perfect for 2â€“10 people. Light topics, easy sharing. Safe space to open up at your own pace.

Moderate Questions.about: A step deeper than small talk. These questions invite meaningful stories, opinions, and experiences without getting too heavy.
Moderate Questions.format: Best for 2â€“8 people. Medium depth, thoughtful answers. Good balance of fun and substance.

In-depth Questions.about: For when you're ready to go beyond the surface. These questions explore values, life lessons, and deeper reflections that show who someone really is.
In-depth Questions.format: Works best with 2â€“6 people. Deeper topics, longer conversations. Build trust and real connection.

Love Couples.about: Designed specifically for couples to deepen intimacy, explore dreams together, and have those sweet or tough conversations that make relationships stronger.
Love Couples.format: Made for 2 people (couples). Intimate questions, honest sharing. Build closeness and understanding.

Parent Perspective.about: Questions from a parent's perspective: exploring parenting styles, passing down values, and the joys and challenges of raising kids.
Parent Perspective.format: Great for 2â€“8 people. Parent-focused topics. Share wisdom, laugh about chaos, bond over the journey.

Child Perspective.about: Reflecting on childhood memories, funny moments, and the unique lens of being a kid. Nostalgia meets playful storytelling.
Child Perspective.format: Perfect for 2â€“10 people. Childhood memories, silly stories. Relive the good old days together.

Sibling Perspective.about: All about sibling dynamics: inside jokes, epic fights, and the chaotic bond that only brothers and sisters understand.
Sibling Perspective.format: Best for 2â€“6 people. Sibling-specific stories. Laugh about rivalry, celebrate the bond.

Grandparent Perspective.about: Honoring the wisdom, humor, and stories of grandparents. Questions that spark cross-generational connection and timeless advice.
Grandparent Perspective.format: Ideal for 2â€“8 people. Multi-generational exchange. Bridge the gap, cherish the stories.

This or That (Funny).about: Ridiculous either-or scenarios that make zero sense but spark huge laughs. Expect absurdity, expect chaos, expect fun.
This or That (Funny).format: Perfect for 2â€“12 people. Silly choices, loud reactions. Zero seriousness, maximum entertainment.

Bold Questions (Funny).about: Hilariously bold questions that push the edge without crossing it. Not offensive, just brave enough to keep things wild.
Bold Questions (Funny).format: Best for 2â€“10 people. Edgy humor, funny confessions. Push the line, get everyone laughing.

This or That (Spicy).about: Flirty, provocative either-or questions that turn up the heat. For adults ready to explore attraction, intimacy, and chemistry.
This or That (Spicy).format: Adults only, 2â€“8 people. Spicy topics, open minds. Flirt, tease, and test boundaries.

Bold Questions (Spicy).about: Unapologetically direct questions about sex, desire, and intimacy. For adult audiences who want raw, honest conversations.
Bold Questions (Spicy).format: Adults only, 2â€“6 people. Explicit content, no filter. Be honest, be bold, be respectful.

Values & Culture.about: Dive into work values, team culture, and what drives you professionally. Great for teams building trust and alignment.
Values & Culture.format: Perfect for 2â€“15 people. Work-focused values. Strengthen team culture, find common ground.

Challenges & Experiences.about: Real talk about professional challenges, growth moments, and lessons learned the hard way. Vulnerability meets career wisdom.
Challenges & Experiences.format: Best for 2â€“10 people. Work experiences, honest reflections. Learn from each other, grow together.

Never Have I Ever.about: The classic game of revealing what you've done (or haven't). Expect confessions, surprises, and lots of 'Wait, really?!' moments.
Never Have I Ever.format: Great for 3â€“12 people. Take turns reading, raise hand if you've done it. Simple, addictive, revealing.

Debate Sparks.about: Hot topics and polarizing opinions designed to get people fired up (in a good way). Defend your stance, hear the other side.
Debate Sparks.format: Best for 4â€“12 people. Pick a side, debate respectfully. Passionate discussion, open minds.

Would You Rather.about: Impossible choices that make you weigh tough tradeoffs. Funny, philosophical, or downright brutal â€” every answer says something.
Would You Rather.format: Perfect for 2â€“10 people. Choose between two options, explain why. Fast rounds or deep discussions.

Truth or Dare.about: The timeless party game of revealing truths or accepting wild challenges. Expect laughter, embarrassment, and unforgettable moments.
Truth or Dare.format: Best for 3â€“10 people. Choose truth or dare, complete the challenge. Keep it fun, keep it safe.
